text:
"Kusum Kusum Prem" is a Bangladeshi Bengali language movie. It was released 2011. The movie directed by Mushfiqur Rahman Gulzar who also wrote the story. The movie produced by Impress Telefilm Limited. The movie stars Moushumi, Ferdous and Riaz in lead roles.
Accolades.
Ferdous Ahmed and Emon Saha has been judged as best actor for his outstanding performance in the film "Kusum Kusum Prem".
